effect_entries.effect: Held: Whenever the holder uses a move that requires a turn to charge first (Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Razor Wind, Skull Bash, Sky Attack, or Solarbeam), this item is consumed and the charge is skipped.  Skull Bash still provides a Defense boost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Both turns of a two-turn charge move happen at once. Consumed upon use.

flavor_text_entries.text: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the holder to immediately use a move that normally requires a turn to charge.
